metadata.synopsis: Charlie Dunlap (Josh Charles) has been obsessed with traffic patterns since he was a boy and reveres traffic reporter Alan Davenport (John Goodman). After moving to Los Angeles to find a job reporting on the freeways, Charlie sees his career stall. However, he runs into childhood friend and teenage love Amy (Anne Heche), now a waitress and dancer in an avant-garde company. Charlie becomes determined both to work for Davenport and to win back Amy, even though she is not interested at first.
